metadata.name: .ch5-list--disabled
metadata.description: Off by default. Add the "disabled" attribute to the ch5-list tag in order to disable the list.
metadata.value:
pointer-events: none;
    opacity: 0.5;

metadata.name: .ch5-list-vertical
metadata.description: The list is displayed vertically by default, you can explicitly add the attribute orientation="vertical".

metadata.name: .ch5-list-horizontal
metadata.description: Applied when orientation="horizontal" to display the list horizontally.
